572:1: atha khalvāyuṣmān subhūtirbhagavantametadavocat-sarvadharmānupalambho batāyaṃ bhagavan dharmo deśyate|
572:3: apratihatalakṣaṇo batāyaṃ bhagavan dharmaḥ ākāśasamatayā sarvapadānupalabdhitaḥ|
572:9: atha khalu devānāmindro brahmā sahāpatiste ca kāmāvacarā rūpāvacarāśca devaputrā bhagavantametadavocan-anujāto batāyaṃ bhagavan bhagavataḥ śrāvaka āryasubhūtiḥ sthaviraḥ|
572:11: tathā hi bhagavan yaṃ yameva ayamāryasubhūtiḥ sthaviro dharmaṃ deśayati,
572:13: atha khalvāyuṣmān subhūtiḥ śakraṃ devānāmindraṃ brahmāṇaṃ ca sahāpatiṃ tāṃśca kāmāvacarān rūpāvacarāṃśca devaputrānāmantrayate sma-yaddevaputrā evaṃ vadatha-anujāto'yaṃ subhūtiḥ sthavirastathāgatasyeti|
572:39: evaṃ hi subhūtiḥ sthavirastayā tathatayā avikāro nirvikāro'vikalpo nirvikalpastathāgatasyānujātaḥ|
572:40: yathā ca tathāgatatathatā avikārā nirvikārā avikalpā nirvikalpā,
572:42: evaṃ sarvadharmatathatā avikārā nirvikārā avikalpā nirvikalpā,
572:61: evameva ca tathāgatatathatayābhinirmitaḥ subhūtiśceti dvayamapyaluptametadabhinnaṃ bhedakānupalabdhitaḥ|
572:71: yathā tathāgatatathatā nātītā na anāgatā na pratyutpannā,
572:72: evaṃ sarvadharmatathatā nātītā nānāgatā na pratyutpannā|
572:73: evaṃ hi subhūtiḥ sthavirastāṃ tathatāmanujātastathāgatamanujāta ityucyate|
572:82: iti hi subhūtitathatā ca atītānāgatapratyutpannatathatā ca tathāgatatathatā ca advayametadadvaidhīkāram|
572:83: evaṃ sarvadharmatathatā ca subhūtitathatā ca advayametadadvaidhīkāram|
572:87: yayā tathatayā bodhisattvo mahāsattvo'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbuddhaḥ san tathāgata iti nāmadheyaṃ labhate|
572:88: asyāṃ khalu punastathātagatathatāyāṃ nirdiśyamānāyāmiyaṃ mahāpṛthivī tasyāṃ velāyāṃ ṣaḍvikāramaṣṭādaśamahānimittamakampat,
572:96: punaraparaṃ subhūtiḥ sthavirastān devaputrānāmantrayate sma-evaṃ hi devaputrāḥ subhūtiḥ sthavirastathāgatamanujātaḥ||
572:97: punaraparaṃ subhūtiḥ sthaviro na rūpamanujāto na vedanāṃ na saṃjñāṃ na saṃskārān na vijñānamanujāto na srotaāpattiphalamanujāto na sakṛdāgāmiphalaṃ na anāgāmiphalaṃ na arhattvaphalamanujāto na pratyekabuddhatvamanujāto na buddhatvamanujātaḥ|
572:99: tathā hi te dharmā na saṃvidyante nopalabhyante yairanujāyeta,
572:102: atha khalvāyuṣmān śāriputro bhagavantametadavocat-gambhīracaryeyaṃ bhagavan yaduta tathatā|
572:105: asmin khalu punastathatānirdeśe nirdiśyamāne trayāṇāṃ bhikṣuśatānāmanupādāyāsravebhyaścittāni vimuktāni,
572:106: pañcānāṃ ca bhikṣuṇīśatānāṃ virajo vigatamalaṃ dharmeṣu dharmacakṣurviśuddham,
572:107: pañcabhiśca devaputrasahasraiḥ pūrvaparikarmakṛtairanutpattikeṣu dharmeṣu kṣāntiḥ pratilabdhā,
572:109: atha khalvāyuṣmān śāriputrasteṣāṃ bodhisattvānāmanupādāyāsravebhyaścittāni vimuktāni viditvā bhagavantametadavocat-ko bhagavan hetuḥ kaḥ pratyayo yadeteṣāṃ bodhisattvānāmanupādāyāsravebhyaścittāni vimuktāni?
572:111: sarvatra ca dānaṃ dattaṃ śīlaṃ rakṣityaṃ kṣāntyā saṃpāditaṃ vīryamārabdhaṃ dhyānānyutpāditāni|
572:112: te khalu punarime prajñāpāramitayā aparigṛhītā upāyakauśalyena ca virahitā abhūvan|
572:113: kiṃcāpi śāriputra eteṣāṃ bodhisattvānāmasti mārgaḥ śūnyatā vā ānimittacaryā vā apraṇihitamanasikāratā vā,
572:117: tadyathāpi nāma śāriputra pakṣiṇaḥ śakuneryojanaśatiko vā dviyojanaśatiko vā triyojanaśatiko vā caturyojanaśatiko vā pañcayojanaśatiko vā ātmabhāvo bhavet|
572:118: sa trāyastriṃśeṣu deveṣu vartamāno jambūdvīpamāgantavyaṃ manyeta|
572:119: sa khalu punaḥ śāriputra pakṣī śakunirajātapakṣo vā bhavet,
572:122: sa trāyastriṃśato devanikāyādātmānamutsṛjet-iha jambūdvīpe pratiṣṭhāsyāmīti manyeta|
572:123: atha tasya pakṣiṇaḥ śakunestataḥ patataḥ ākāśe antarīkṣe sthitasya antarā cittasyaivaṃ bhavet-aho batāhaṃ punareva trāyastriṃśeṣu deveṣu pratiṣṭheyamiti|
572:124: tatkiṃ manyase śāriputra api nu sa pakṣī śakuniḥ pratibalaḥ punareva trāyastriṃśeṣu deveṣu pratiṣṭhātum?
572:127: tatkiṃ manyase śāriputra api nu sa pakṣī śakunirakṛto'nupahato jambūdvīpe pratiṣṭhet?
572:129: kṛtaśca sa bhagavan upahataśca bhavejjambūdvīpe ca patitaḥ san maraṇaṃ vā nigacchet maraṇamātrakaṃ vā duḥkham|
572:135: kiṃ cāpi śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvo'nuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittānyutpādya gaṅgānadīvālukopamān kalpāṃstiṣṭhan dānaṃ dadyāt,
572:143: sacedayaṃ prajñāpāramitayā aparigṛhīta upāyakauśalyena ca virahito bhavet,
572:144: evaṃ śrāvakabhūmiṃ vā pratyekabuddhabhūmiṃ vā patati||
572:145: punaraparaṃ śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvo'tītānāgatapratyutpannānāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ tacchīlaṃ taṃ samādhiṃ tāṃ prajñāṃ tāṃ vimuktiṃ tadvimuktijñānadarśanaṃ samanvāharati,
572:147: na sa tathāgatānāmarhatāṃ samyaksaṃbuddhānāṃ śīlaṃ na jānāti na paśyati|
572:148: na samādhiṃ na prajñāṃ na vimuktiṃ na vimuktijñānadarśanaṃ tathāgatānāmarhatāṃ samyaksaṃbuddhānāṃ jānāti, na paśyati|
572:151: taṃ śabdaṃ nimittīkṛtya anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pariṇāmayitumicchati|
572:152: tato veditavyametat-sthāsyatyayaṃ śrāvakabhūmau vā pratyekabuddhabhūmau veti|
572:154: evaṃ hyetacchāriputra bhavati-yatprajñāpāramitayā aparigṛhītaḥ upāyakauśalyena ca virahito bhavati||
572:155: śāriputra āha-yathāhaṃ bhagavan bhagavato bhāṣitasyārthamājānāmi-yo bodhisattvaḥ prajñāpāramitayā aparigṛhītaḥ upāyakauśalyena ca virahitaḥ,
572:156: kiṃcāpi sa bahunāpi puṇyasaṃbhāreṇa yuktaḥ kalyāṇamitravirahitaśca bhavati,
572:158: tasmāttarhi bhagavan bodhisattvena mahāsattvena anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃboddhukāmena prajñāpāramitā bhāvayitavyā,
572:163: kiṃcāpi sa bahunā puṇyasaṃbhāreṇa yuktaḥ kalyāṇamitravirahitaśca bhavati,
572:165: tasmāttarhi śāriputra bodhisattvena mahāsattvena anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃboddhukāmena prajñāpāramitā bhāvayitavyā,
572:167: atha khalu śakro devānāmindraḥ sārdhaṃ kāmāvacarairdevaputraiḥ,
572:168: brahmāpi sahāpatiḥ rūpāvacarairdevaputraiḥ sārdhaṃ bhagavantametadavocat-gambhīrā bhagavan prajñāpāramitā,
572:171: atha khalu bhagavāṃstān śakradevendrapramukhān kāmāvacarān devaputrān sahāpatimahābrahmapramukhān rūpāvacarāṃśca devaputrānāmantrayate sma-evametaddevaputrāḥ, evametat|
572:182: na sa kaściddharmaḥ saṃvidyate yo dharmaḥ śakyo'bhisaṃboddhum|
572:184: yasyāpi bhagavan dharmasya prahāṇāya dharmo deśyate,
572:191: anenāpi bhagavan paryāyeṇa mamaivaṃ bhavati-svabhisaṃbhavā anuttarā samyaksaṃbodhirabhisaṃboddhuṃ na durabhisaṃbhaveti|
572:192: evamukte bhagavānāyuṣmantaṃ subhūtimetadavocat-asaṃbhavatvātsubhūte durabhisaṃbhavā anuttarā samyaksaṃbodhiḥ|
572:197: atha khalvāyuṣmān śāriputra āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtimetadavocat-śūnyamityanenāpyāyuṣman subhūte paryāyeṇa durabhisaṃbhavā anuttarā samyaksaṃbodhiḥ|
572:200: na hyāyuṣman subhūte ākāśasyaivaṃ bhavati-ahamanuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbhotsye iti|
572:201: evaṃ ca āyuṣman subhūte ime dharmā abhisaṃboddhavyāḥ|
572:204: yadi cāyuṣman subhūte svabhisaṃbhavā bhavedanuttarā samyaksaṃbodhiḥ,
572:205: na tvevaṃ gaṅgānadīvālukopamā bodhisattvā vivarterannanuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodheḥ|
572:206: yasmāttarhyāyuṣman subhūte gaṅgānadīvālukopamā bodhisattvā vivartante'nuttarayāḥ samyaksaṃbodheḥ,
572:207: tasmādāyuṣman subhūte evaṃ vijñāyate-durabhisaṃbhavā anuttarā samyaksaṃbodhiḥ|
572:209: evamukte āyuṣman subhūtirāyuṣmantaṃ śāriputrametadavocat-kiṃ punarāyuṣman śāriputra rūpaṃ vivartate anuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodheḥ?
572:211: subhūtirāha-kiṃ punarāyuṣman śāriputra anyatra rūpātsa dharmaḥ,
572:214: subhūtirāha-kiṃ punarāyuṣman śāriputra vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārā vijñānaṃ vivartate'nuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodheḥ?
572:216: subhūtirāha-kiṃ punarāyuṣman śāriputra anyatra vedanāyāḥ saṃjñāyāḥ saṃskārebhyo'nyatra vijñānāt sa dharmaḥ,
572:222: subhūtirāha-kiṃ punarāyuṣman śāriputra yā vedanātathatā saṃjñātathatā saṃskāratathatā,
572:226: subhūtirāha-kiṃ punarāyuṣman śāriputra anyatra rūpatathatāyāḥ sa dharmaḥ,
572:229: subhūtirāha-kiṃ punarāyuṣman śāriputra anyatra vedanātathatāyāḥ saṃjñātathatāyāḥ saṃskāratathatāyāḥ,
572:233: subhūtirāha-kiṃ punarāyuṣman śāriputra rūpamabhisaṃbudhyate anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim?
572:235: subhūtirāha-kiṃ punarāyuṣman śāriputra vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārā vijñānamabhisaṃbudhyate anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim?
572:237: subhūtirāha-kiṃ punarāyuṣman śāriputra anyatra rūpātsa dharmaḥ,
572:240: subhūtirāha-kiṃ punarāyuṣman śāriputra anyatra vedanāyāḥ saṃjñāyāḥ saṃskārebhyaḥ,
572:244: subhūtirāha-kiṃ punarāyuṣman śāriputra rūpatathatā anuttarāṃ saṃbodhimabhisaṃbudhyate?
572:246: subhūtirāha-kiṃ punarāyuṣman śāriputra vedanātathatā saṃjñātathatā saṃskāratathatā vijñānatathatā anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbudhyate?
572:248: subhūtirāha-kiṃ punarāyuṣman śāriputra anyatra rūpatathatāyāḥ sa dharmaḥ,
572:251: subhūtirāha-kiṃ punarāyuṣman śāriputra anyatra vedanātathatāyāḥ saṃjñātathatāyāḥ saṃskāratathatāyāḥ,
572:255: subhūtirāha-kiṃ punarāyuṣman śāriputra rūpaṃ boddhavyamanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau?
572:257: subhūtirāha-kiṃ punarāyuṣman śāriputra vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārā vijñānaṃ boddhavyamanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau?
572:259: subhūtirāha-kiṃ punarāyuṣman śāriputra anyatra rūpātsa dharmaḥ,
572:262: subhūtirāha-kiṃ punarāyuṣman śāriputra anyatra vedanāyāḥ saṃjñāyāḥ saṃskārebhyaḥ,
572:263: anyatra vijñānātsa dharmaḥ yo boddhavyo'nuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau ?
572:265: subhūtirāha-kiṃ punarāyuṣman śāriputra rūpatathatā boddhavyā anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau?
572:267: subhūtirāha-kiṃ punarāyuṣman śāriputra vedanātathatā saṃjñātathatā saṃskāratathatā vijñānatathatā boddhavyā anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau?
572:269: subhūtirāha-kiṃ punarāyuṣman śāriputra anyatra rūpatathatāyāḥ sa dharmaḥ,
572:272: subhūtirāha-kiṃ punarāyuṣman śāriputra anyatra vedanātathatāyāḥ saṃjñātathatāyāḥ saṃskāratathatāyāḥ,
572:276: subhūtirāha-takiṃ manyase āyuṣman śāriputra tathatā vivartate anuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodheḥ?
572:278: subhūtirāha-tatkiṃ manyase āyuṣman śāriputra tathatāyāṃ sa dharmaḥ,
572:281: subhūtirāha-tatkatamaḥ punarāyuṣman śāriputra sa dharmo yo vivartate anuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodheḥ?
572:283: katamo vā punaḥ sa śāriputra dharmo yā tathatā?
572:286: subhūtirāha-evamāyuṣman śāriputra satyataḥ sthitito'nupalabhyamānānāṃ sarvadharmāṇāṃ katamaḥ sa dharmaḥ,
572:288: evamukte āyuṣmān śāriputra āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtimetadavocat-yayā dharmanayajātyā āyuṣmān subhūtiḥ sthaviro nirdiśati,
572:289: tayā na sa kaściddharmo yo vivartate'nuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodheḥ|
572:290: ye ca khalu punarime āyuṣman subhūte trayo bodhisattvayānikāḥ pudgalāstathāgatenākhyātāḥ,
572:292: ekameva hi yānaṃ bhavati yaduta buddhayānaṃ bodhisattvayānaṃ yathā āyuṣmataḥ subhūternirdeśaḥ||
572:293: atha khalvāyuṣmān pūrṇo maitrāyaṇīputra āyuṣmantaṃ śāriputrametadavocat-kiṃ punarāyuṣman śāriputra āyuṣmān subhūtiḥ sthaviraḥ ekamapi bodhisattvaṃ nābhyupagacchati śrāvakayānikaṃ vā pratyekabuddhayānikaṃ vā mahāyānikaṃ vā|
572:295: atha khalvāyuṣmān śāriputra āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtimetadavocat-kiṃ punastvamāyuṣman subhūte ekamapi bodhisattvaṃ nābhyupagacchasi śrāvakayānikaṃ vā pratyekabuddhayānikaṃ vā mahāyānikaṃ vā?
572:297: tatra tathatāyāmekamapi bodhisattvaṃ samanupaśyasi śrāvakayānikaṃ vā pratyekabuddhayānikaṃ vā mahāyānikaṃ vā?
572:305: subhūtirāha- evamāyuṣman śāriputra satyataḥ sthititastasya bodhisattvadharmasyānupalabhyamānasya kutastavaivaṃ bhavati-ayaṃ śrāvakayānikaḥ,
572:308: evameteṣāmāyuṣman śāriputra bodhisattvānāṃ tathatāyāṃ pravibhāvyamānānāmaviśeṣatāṃ nirviśeṣatāṃ nirnānākaraṇatāṃ śrutvā yasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya cittaṃ nāvalīyate na saṃlīyate na pṛṣṭhībhavati,
572:310: atha khalu bhagavānāyuṣmantaṃ subhūtimetadavocat-sādhu sādhu subhūte|
572:312: pratibhāti te subhūte yathāpi nāma tathāgatānubhāvena buddhādhiṣṭhānenedaṃ vadasi|
572:313: evameteṣāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ tathatāyāṃ pravibhāvyamānānāmaviśeṣatāṃ nirviśeṣatāṃ nirnānākaraṇatāṃ śrutvā yasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya cittaṃ nāvalīyate na saṃlīyate na pṛṣṭhībhavati,
572:315: atha khalvāyuṣmān śāriputro bhagavantametadavocat-katamayā bhagavan bodhyā niryāsyatyayaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ?
572:316: bhagavānāha-anuttarayā śāriputra samyaksaṃbodhyā niryāsyatyayaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ||
572:317: atha khalvāyuṣmān subhūtirbhagavantametadavocat-anuttarāyāṃ bhagavan samyaksaṃbodhau niryātukāmena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena kathaṃ sthātavyaṃ kathaṃ śikṣitavyam?
572:318: bhagavānāha-anuttarāyāṃ subhūte samyaksaṃbodhau niryātukāmena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena sarvasattveṣu samaṃ sthātavyam|
572:328: sarvasattveṣu mātṛsaṃjñāmupasthāya pitṛsaṃjñāṃ putrasaṃjñāṃ duhitṛsaṃjñāṃ copasthāpya pare ālambitavyāḥ|
572:329: evaṃ hi subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃboddhukāmena sarvasattvānāmantike sthātavyam,
572:332: dānaṃ dātavyaṃ śīlaṃ rakṣitavyaṃ kṣāntyā saṃpādayitavyaṃ vīryamārabdhavyaṃ dhyānaṃ samāpattavyaṃ prajñāyāṃ parijayaḥ kartavyaṃ,
572:334: anyeṣāmapi tatra samādāpakena tadvarṇavādinā tatsamanujñena ca bhavitavyam|
572:335: evaṃ satyeṣu yāvadbodhisattvanyāmāvakrāntau sattvaparipācane ca sthitvā anyeṣāmapi tatra samādāpakena tadvarṇavādinā tatsamanujñena ca bhavitavyam|
572:336: tasyaivaṃ spṛhayata evaṃ śikṣamāṇasya anāvaraṇaṃ rūpaṃ yāvaddharmasthitiranāvaraṇā bhaviṣyatīti||
